alert.note: Alert for Marathon; Portage; Wood (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued October 24 at 10:00AM CDT until October 24 at 10:30AM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1030 AM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN WOOD...NORTHERN PORTAGE AND SOUTHEASTERN MARATHON COUNTIES... At 959 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles southwest of Mosinee, or 14 miles northwest of Stevens Point, moving east at 50 mph. Another severe storm was situated just north of Hewitt, and moving east. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Locations impacted include... Stevens Point, Marshfield, Mosinee, Bevent, Knowlton, Norrie, Hewitt, Sherry, Auburndale, and Jordan. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
